code: import React from'react';import'../AdminDashboard.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ActivityFeed=_ref=>{let{activities,title='Recent Activity'}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"dashboard-panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"panel-title",children:title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-feed",children:activities&&activities.length>0?activities.map((activity,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"activity-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-icon",children:activity.type==='user'?'ðŸ‘¤':activity.type==='content'?'ðŸ“„':activity.type==='promotion'?'ðŸš€':'ðŸ“Š'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"activity-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-title",children:activity.title||'Action performed'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-description",children:activity.description||'No description available'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"activity-time",children:activity.timestamp?new Date(activity.timestamp.seconds*1000).toLocaleString():'Unknown time'})]})]},index)):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"empty-state",children:"No recent activities to display"})})]});};export default ActivityFeed;
